name: XML Editor
description: The application is designed for viewing and editing .xml, .html and other text files. Implemented the opportunity of the editing by two ways: by rows and page by page.  Implemented: 1) the ability to open files in different encodings; 2) auto-detect encodigs:  KOI8-R  MACCYRILLIC  IBM866  IBM855  WINDOWS-1251  WINDOWS-1252  WINDOWS-1253  WINDOWS-1255  ISO-8859-5  ISO-8859-7  ISO-8859-8  ISO-2022-CN  ISO-2022-JP  ISO-2022-KR  BIG-5  UTF-8  UTF-16BE | UTF-16LE  UTF-32BE | UTF-32LE 3) saving file with selected encoding; 4) creation of the new (buffer) document; 5) open a file from another application; 6) preview of the .FB2 file; 7) sending a file (with applications: Google drive, mail...); 8) copying document in the application folder XML Editor (for Android 4.4 or above); 9) find/change text dialog (menu).
